indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1)Number of persons living with HIV/AIDS receiving antiretroviral treatment 2)Number of episodes of OIs treated among people ( adult) on ART (2012) 3)% of health facilities dispensing ARVs which have experienced a stock-out of at least one required ARV in the last 12 months 4)Number of HIV - positive pregnant women who received ARVs to reduce the risk of mother to child transmission 5)Number of Provinces supervised ( only 2013 and 2014) 6)Number of people trained in M&E and data collection tools ( only 2013 and 2014)

baseline.comment: 1) 2000 PLWHA receiving ARV treatment (adults and children) 2) 100 HIV+ Pregnant women receiving Prophylaxis and treatment 3) 5Labs. established 4) 10 VCTs established 5) 22,000 people counselled and tested on HIV/AIDS 6)4 health centres providing PMTCT services according to national guidelines

location.name: Angola
location.activity-description: Assist the national civil protection system in enhancing disaster and risk management capacity.

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: 1) Number of Civil Protection Commission members trained in contingency planning and disaster response at national and local levels. 2) Number of drought hazard preparedness and mitigation plans in place in the southern region. 3) Strategic planning framework established in advancing Disaster Risk Management agenda in the country including preparation of next cycle (2015-2019). 4) A resource mobilization tool annually developed by the mine action authority - CNIDAH. 5) Article 7 Transparency report submitted by the CNIDAH annually under the Anti-Personnel Mine Ban Convention.

baseline.comment: 1) 0 [2009] 2) 0 [2009] 3) Needs to update and renew strategic planning framework at the national level in advancing Disaster Risk Management agenda. 4) The national mine action programme requires continued support from the Mine Action Support Group. 5) Angola is required to annually report to the UN on the implementation of the Mine Ban Convention as a state party.

target.comment: 1) 500 2) 3 3) The Strategic Plan on Disaster Risk Management (DRM) 2015-2017 developed and preparation of next cycle (2015-2017) made. 4) The Portfolio of Mine Action Projects 2015 prepared. 5) Article 7 Transparency report and Work plan 2014-2017 presented.

actual.comment: 1) 548 2) 6 3) National Disaster Risk Management Plan 2015-2017 was drafted, and DRR programming 2015-2017 was completed for approval. 4) The Portfolio of Mine Action Projects 2015 was prepared by CNIDAH. 5) Article 7 Transparency report 2014 and Work plan 2014-2017 was presented by Angola at the 3rd Review Conference of the Anti-Personnel Mine Ban Convention, Maputo in June.
